name: Advanced Sale Percentage Badge
author: Ido Navarro

sections.description: Showing labels with the sale percentage value has come really easy and fast with the Advanced Sale Percentage Badge plugin. Promote your sale products, the plugin helps you demonstrate a label on a product card, with a sale percent value.
sections.installation:
Important: First of all, you have to download and activate WooCommerce plugin, because without it Advanced Sale Percentage Badge cannot work.

  1. Unzip the downloaded .zip file.
  2. Upload the Advanced Sale Percentage Badge plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate Advanced Sale Percentage Badge from Plugins page.

short_description: Make the product card more informative! Show how much less percent the product has become cheaper for your customers than before.
description: Showing labels with the sale percentage value has come really easy and fast with the Advanced Sale Percentage Badge plugin. Promote your sale products, the plugin helps you demonstrate a label on a product card, with a sale percent value.
